review: It works as advertised and the reduced price is a plus!

review: So far I am happy with this purchase, I also have Netflix and there are a lot mote movies on Amazon, and I like the free shipping!

review: Easy to install and works well

review: Love it. Originally for the living room, but I moved my other media streamers to the other rooms, and put this one in my bedroom. Line of sight not necessary and no 2-minute start-up? Yes, please. Downloaded lots of useful apps, too.
author: JassmineSasha

review: I absolutely love this! I just wish there was more features like being able to browse Amazon from  your Fire tv or be able to have a actual browser on it.
author: kindle fire

review: One of the best portable device in class.voice command on remote works well.

review: Took me awhile to figure out how to use it, but I'm enjoying it.
